event.title: was selected by the Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Development in 2003

data.event: Nono was selected by the Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Development in 2003 as an area for voluntary resettlement for farmers from overpopulated areas.
That year this woreda became the home for a total of 590 heads of households and 391 total family members.

event.title: The next year this woreda was selected

data.event: The next year this woreda was selected again as a resettlement area, and became the home of a total of 2370 heads of household and a total of 16,350 family members.
